descr.p: Hint: In MSEgui one very seldom uses TEdit but one of the TDataEdit descendants (TStringEdit, TIntegerEdit...). They have the event properties OnSetValue and OnDataEntered which can be used in order to react on user entries.

short.p: Event handler for when the TEdit text changes.
Note that the OnChange event also fires when the Form that contains the TEdit, is displayed for the first time. This is due to how MSEgui synchronises the streamed values from the *.mfm file.
